TEXT.TITLE: STERIVET <STVTF> SETS THREE-FOR-ONE SHARE SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Sterivet Laboratories Ltd said the board authorized a three-for-one split of its outstanding common shares, subject shareholder approval at the annual meeting. Reuter
